definition: (bird species of China) Eurasian magpie (Pica pica)
to be fond of/to like/to enjoy/to be happy/to feel pleased/happiness/delight/glad
(bird species of China) azure-winged magpie (Cyanopica cyanus)

sentences.english: The magpies nest year high, waterlogging rain.
sentences.chinese: 喜鹊搭窝高，当年雨水涝。

sentences.english: Magpie and Cui son which is insolating clothes in the yard got a fright.
sentences.chinese: 正在院子里晒衣服的喜鹊和翠儿吓了一跳。

sentences.english: The bird and magpie lives face to face and they become neighbor.
sentences.chinese: 寒号鸟和喜鹊面对面住着，成了邻居。

sentences.english: Then there were the magpies and the kookaburras.
One old magpie began wrapping itself up very carefully.
sentences.chinese: 一只老喜鹊非常小心地用羽毛裹紧自己的身体。

sentences.english: If I'll be gone, and that two supposed to Magpies it?
sentences.chinese: 我要是不在了，那两只喜鹊可咋办呢？

sentences.english: Besides ，we can take some pied magpies home for BBQ.
sentences.chinese: 此外，我们还可以打一些喜鹊回家用来烧烤。

sentences.english: Her beauty makes magpies merrily fly among the trees.
sentences.chinese: 惹得那个喜鹊满呀么满树飞。

sentences.english: Watership auspicious festive magpie and form full of persimmon.
sentences.chinese: 取材于吉祥喜庆的喜鹊和形态饱满的柿子。

sentences.english: James: besides , we can take some pied magpies home , for BBQ .
sentences.chinese: 此外，我们还可以打些喜鹊回家，用来烧烤。

sentences.english: Equal be, you, I , magpie , the Cui son be all similar.
sentences.chinese: 平等就是，你，我，喜鹊，翠儿都是一样的。

sentences.english: But Magpie would not go to California.
sentences.chinese: 不过喜鹊不会去加利福尼亚的。

sentences.english: The Taipei Bears will be squaring off against the Nantou Magpies.
sentences.chinese: 台北熊队将和南投喜鹊队较劲。

sentences.english: Niu Lang and Zhi Nu would walk towards each other on the magpies' heads to meet.
sentences.chinese: 牛郎织女踩在一只只喜鹊的头上走过去聚会。

sentences.english: Superstitious people believe that the sight of magpie is a good omen.
sentences.chinese: 迷信的说法认为看见喜鹊是祥瑞的征兆。

sentences.english: Sparrows and magpies, those kind of things.
sentences.chinese: 麻雀和喜鹊，诸如此类的鸟类。
